column1: KINGDOM OF THE NETHERLANDS—CURAÇAO AND SINT MAARTEN
Sources: Data provided by the authorities and IMF staff estimates.
1/ From 2016, the central government operations include the social security bank (SVB).
2/ Includes transfers to cover the deficit of funds not integrated into the central government budget, such as those for social security/insurance.
3/ The denominator is the average of total revenue in the previous three years.
